website_summaries.verdict: A rich, hydrating overnight mask that will leave your skin feeling soft and nourished.
pros: Rich cream that spreads easily and feels light on skin
Doesn't leave your skin looking greasy
Suitable for use on sensitive skin
Gives you a healthy, natural glow
cons: Some find the scent to be unpleasant

customer_reviews.title: Fake product !!! Be aware
customer_reviews.text: Thsi is a fake product... doesn’t resemble the one in Sephora. I won’t put this on my skin I basically wasted 20$ on this.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: ... initially purchased this product in retail store and I loved it. So I bought it online
customer_reviews.text: I had initially purchased this product in retail store and I loved it. So I bought it online, but this product sold in online is different than the ones in the retail store. I went back to the retailer to verify this. The smell, texture and consistency is totally different compared to the ones sold in retail store. I would not buy this product online ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Ji S. Kim

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My god, a 5 star rating is not enough for this product. I have a friend who is an "influencer" or whatever, and she posted this product on her instagram. She was raving about it so much that I got curious and bit the bullet. I have started to use it every night and I can already tell my face is a lot clearer than it was before. I'm OBSESSED! I would buy a million times over. It's so light, it feels and smells nice and delicate. It doesn't leave my face insanely greasy and it even comes with a little applicator, which I love. LOVE LOVE LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and thick and has a fresh scent
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and thick and has a fresh scent, and doesn't leave your skin feeling oily before bed. By the time I wake up my skin feels fresh and almost plump instead of dry or dehydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Toram

customer_reviews.title: Great for combination/sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad eczema and the changing seasons made me break out immensly in some parts, while drying out in others. This mask hydrated my face the entire day, evened my skin tone, and got rid of the redness and discoloration. the fragrance was slightly irritating when I first applied it, but once the product was absorbed, it felt very calming, cooling, and nice. to notice such a big difference in a day made this purchase worth every penny. Korean skin care is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy The Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: As an Asian customer who had used Laneige sleeping masks for years, I can assure you that this is a 100% fake product. Very artificial aroma. I wrote this simply because it is not able to return otherwise I would do it definitely. This is even an Amazon’s Choice?! Shame on you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HUMAN HAIR IN PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this very excited to use it based on other reviews, however upon arrival, I opened the product and as you can see in the image, stuck to the bottom of the seal(the part that touches the product) WAS A HUMAN HAIR. I'm a fair bit disgusted by this.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Made my skin happy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I was worried when I read the instructions and it mentioned the fragrance. I have sensitive/reactive skin with rosacea and need to be very careful about products with fragrance. However, this had a light fragrance and didn't cause any negative reaction. It made my skin feel plump and moist (both gross words, but accurate). I actually even used it 2 nights in a row and saw nothing but positive effects. My skin was dewy and smooth. Woo hoo!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE drying of skin
customer_reviews.text: This product did the literal opposite of What it should have done. I tried this product for 3 weeks only to notice my skin gradually getting worse dry patches. My chin looked disgusting! I know it was this product because I do the 10 step Korean skin care with snail mucin serum + essence + moisturizer. I really wanted to like this product, I read so many positive reviews about it. It makes me wonder if I got a fake product.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Feels so cold and comforting
customer_reviews.text: YES!!! This product has completely saved my skin this winter. It feels amazing and cold going on, which was a relief for my dry, painful skin. All other moisturizers burned, but this one feels like heaven. After only two or three nights of putting this on before bed and using a heavy day time moisturizer my dry skin was gone!
customer_reviews.author: C. James

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed...
customer_reviews.text: I tried this along with the Laneige 4-piece "Basic Step Moisture Trial Set." First, when I put it all on, my face feels absolutely saturated and weighed down, slightly uncomfortable. I put the mask on top of all that (as instructed), and when I wake up in the morning my skin is just dry and looks normal. There are better night masks out there, I wouldn't waste my time with this one.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: faked  of something?
customer_reviews.text: This product make my skin itches and dry, It look like faked product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff however...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on amazon as I previously purchased this product at Sephora. It’s more expensive at Sephora however, I noticed that the packaging for this one is a little different. It smells and moisturizes the same as the jar I bought at Sephora. I even did a comparison putting the Sephora one on one side of my face and the amazon one on the other. I’m giving this the benefit of the doubt but overall it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer for my Dry and Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! I have pretty dry skin, and this works wonders. I use it any time of the day, but at night, I'll put a thicker layer on. It keeps my face moisturized so I don't have dry patchy skin. It also smells amazing, and the bottle is very cute. I appreciate that it has a little plastic scooper to ensure cleanliness. It is now a staple in my skincare routine, which I have been paying more attention to since we're locked in during COVID-19, and my skin is loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Angelee Winn

customer_reviews.title: Look refreshed next morning
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this when I was just about to have my third child as I read that if you wear this overnight with very little sleep, your skin still looks good. I have to say that it does the trick. I would put this on a few times a week and it kept my skin looking decent without doing my normal skin routine opting for more sleep rather than my usual 30 minute routine. This was a simple trick that maintained my skin during a hard time.
customer_reviews.author: McZack

customer_reviews.title: A little tacky,sticky
customer_reviews.text: I was using this product at my daughters house while visiting and loved it. I came home and looked it up on Amazon. I ordered it and when it arrived I was super excited used it that night and it just wasn’t the same, left my face feeling a little sticky/gooey. I compared my jar to my daughters and my jar had nothing in English besides the name and what it was. Would not buy again. I tried to save a few bucks I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing. Skin is super soft
customer_reviews.text: Not the nicest smell, but it helped add extra moisture to my skin at a fraction of the cost of my creams from my preferred skin care brand! I just add it over top of everything after I've completed my skin carcare routine to seal everything in and add extra moisture.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my most favorite beauty products ever! The consistency is beautiful, it dries with a softness, which makes it lovely to sleep in. My skin always feels refreshed and replenished after each application. Really a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: chongo

customer_reviews.title: It isn't even remotely moisturizing. The few times that ...
customer_reviews.text: It isn't even remotely moisturizing. The few times that I used it, I ended up reapplying my old moisturizer over it because it was just not doing anything. I don't have dry skin either, I have combination skin, but this product just did not work for me. I wish I had looked to purchase or try it elsewhere so I could return or exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: G V

customer_reviews.title: Most favorite night cream!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite of all night creams! I have dry skin but I don't like thick, creamy products. This hydrates my skin and has a watery texture (hence, the name). I love it and recommend anyone to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money, just buy from Sephora
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this was a massive let down. I got this as a sample from sephora and I loved it so much I wanted to get the full bottle. My dumb self didn't just pay the money to get it from sephora and bought it from here. I think it may be fake, the scent is off and it made my skin even drier and flakier, it's a far cry from the product I sampled from sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: and your lips) this product is awesome though. I have sensitive skin and this mask ...
customer_reviews.text: You guys....I’m OBSESSED with Laneige products-especially the lip sleeping masks (if you haven’t tried them please do because they very well could change your life...and your lips) this product is awesome though. I have sensitive skin and this mask has some good things for it. The smell is nice and light and not overpowering. I typically use it 3 x a week after my moisturizer and wake up with beautiful glowing skin! I truly can’t say enough good things about this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelcee Schenk

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My face feels very soft the mornings after I use this product.

customer_reviews.title: Been using it for years, still no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as a nightly moisturizer, and it works great. It doesn't smell or clog my pores, in fact its very soothing and it works great. I've had very acne prone skin, so looking for moisturizers that don't clog my pores is really hard, but Laneige does a great job. This is probably the only cosmetic product I keep buying consistently. I can't rate it highly enough. It lasts for several months without having the quality degrade, and has even kept me moisturized through months of Accutane in very dry winters. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Laniege is a Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these as gifts, since I started using it myself. This is now my go-to brand for all of my facial products. I plan on trying all of the other Laniege products that seem appropriate for my face, as I begin to run out of the products I am using myself, and will definitely give the thumbs up/down here, when I do!
customer_reviews.author: DNChapek

customer_reviews.title: Broke my sister and I out
customer_reviews.text: Love the consistency of this product and really wanted to like it overall, however it caused me to break out into small pimples. I very rarely find products that cause me to break out so I was very surprised by this, especially since this product is very light on the skin. I gave it to my sister to try and she had the same result unfortunately. I don't use many products with a lot of fragrance in it and this product definitely does, so the fragrance is possibly the reason why my skin did not react well to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps previous layers of my nighttime routine locked in until morning.
customer_reviews.text: I follow a kbeauty skincare regime and this is a wonderful final step! There's no scent (at least to me there isn't), which is a bonus because I hate sleeping packs/masks that have an overwhelming scent. It feels very light going on, but I wake up with soft, moisturized skin the next morning. It is now summer where I live so my skin tends to be on the oilier side, but I plan to see how well this works this winter when my skin is drier and more dehydrated.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product on you tube and alot of people is raving about this so why not give it a shot. My skin is very sensitive and also dry. So i tried this first in the evening before i went to bed and leave it overnight, the next day my skin was hydrated. Just wow! i would recommend this product and it was quick shipment too product as describe. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaja Timbas

customer_reviews.title: My second order
customer_reviews.text: I bought this previously but not sure if it's the exact same thing. They had one that said 'new' and this one as 2015. Either way this one is just as good. It's a great nighttime mask to wear. I don't feel it at all and just put it on as a moisturizer.. It's very light and hardly know I'm wearing anything. It does keep my skin smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Pat K

customer_reviews.title: A soothing, moisturizing treat
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is pretty delightful, from the container to the consistency to the way it feels on your face. I bought some after starting a retinol regimen, and it was the only moisturizing product that didn’t burn. I now use it every night and my skin is the softest and clearest it’s ever been.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Archer

customer_reviews.title: No, No, No - Doesn't DO Anything
customer_reviews.text: It's an attractive color and SOUNDS like it would moisturizer, buuuuuut no. I currently just put on a thick layer of L'Oreal Nightime Cell Renewal and that does great. (Great as in the morning brings clearly plumped skin, clearly diminished crows feet and nasal lines.). Hoped for something less "old-womnish." Didn't find it in the Lanier Water Sleeping Mask. With it, the morning brought deeper lines (kinda a shock.). I wouldn't recommend this to anyone. I wouldn't give the barely used product to anyone to try. Into the trash it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I've only used a few times but it worked very well. It dried quickly on my face and felt normal; not like I was using a mask. In the morning after washing my face it felt soft and fully moisturized. Without makeup, a friend commented on how my face had such good color. If this product continues to work I will certainly reorder from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lucie

customer_reviews.title: Fake/Expired
customer_reviews.text: The texture, smell is exactly like the original product. Have been blessed with skin that barely breaks out. I had break out every single time I applied it. The product from Sephora never does this. Order from Sephora. Something wrong here
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: The smell, the texture, and the packing everything is to die for! I love it! Can't live without it.
customer_reviews.author: Tharushi Liyanage

customer_reviews.title: This mask is pretty good! I was looking for a night time ...
customer_reviews.text: This mask is pretty good! I was looking for a night time mask and it dries down fast, and doesn't feel gross when you wake up. Really helped my skin be less gross, dry, and flaky, and I haven't had as many skin flare ups while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: My second jar!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical at first when I was looking to purchase a product for my sensitive acne prone skin. I bought this sleeping mask and the first night I tried it then the next day I was very happy. It has a very light scent. My skin felt hydrated, and looked brighter. I have acne, and some scars and quite some pores. I have been using some medicine and treatment that leave my skin very very dry and sometimes peeling. It was important to find a product that moisturize and hydrate my skin without making it look oily. This is my second jar of this mask I love it cause I have great result.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Very Hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I use this along with my Clarins Moisturizer before bed and it works great! I will definitely repurchase. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Super Hydrating!
customer_reviews.text: I have atopic dermatitis, so my skin is very sensitive to everything. I have worn this product for three nights and it is INCREDIBLE! I normally use CeraVe cream at night because it is thick and great for my super dry, sensitive skin. This product is even better!! I haven't had a single bad reaction with it. My skin feels butter soft when I wake up. I put quite a bit on and just spend the time massaging my face to get the product in my skin. Highly recommend for people with eczema and atopic dermatitis or even people with dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Laneige is a pretty good skin care line. I was skeptical about this but I took a chance. I love this product! Not too thick or cakey, applies nice & light. Love the smell & makes my skin glow/look fresh & smooth in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Misaki

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love so much. The texture is super light & gel-like .. it absorbs in seconds. Not perfumey. When it use it (especially after skipping a night) I really notice a difference. I have sensitive skin & many products are too harsh. My skin also errs on the dry side so I really benefit from using this over night. It’s not heavy so you won’t have to wash your face in the morning if you’re running late Took me about 4 months to finish using almost every night on my entire face & neck I highly recommend !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drys out my skin
customer_reviews.text: This product feels as though it is drying out my face rather than hydrating it
customer_reviews.author: Canned fish

customer_reviews.title: Nice smell, feeling, and after use, skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is really nice and calming to put at the end of the day and rest with. I already have clearer skin so I'm only victim to a few pimples that may come and go, but I've noticed the frequency of their arrivals decrease with this mask. I feel as though my skin looks brighter in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Ajshe Sulejmani

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the first time I've written a review or maybe I forgot, but MAN just the first night after I used this the next morning my face felt like a baby's butt. I used in combo with the Mizon Snail Repair Intensive Ampoule, so I'm not sure if it's pulling all the work. The texture of the product feels light and the product does feel like it provides a lot of moisture (just as much add regular cream to me anyways). I'll definitely keep buying this. I see what the hype is about now. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I leave t on over night and my face is glowing the next day. It feels very light on your skin and not sticky at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: tisha

customer_reviews.title: Feels and smells incredible
customer_reviews.text: This product is AMAZING. First of all it smells fantastic. Every night when I put it on my boyfriend says “your face smells good” lol. Secondly it FEELS AMAZING. Every time I put it on I think “ahhh that feels so good.” It makes my face glow and feel so nice and hydrated. Couldn’t recommend more.
customer_reviews.author: E Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer without feeling overly heavy
customer_reviews.text: This winter has been brutal for my skin and this mask has been an absolute life saver! I love using is after exfoliating (Cocokind Sea Moss exfoliater). When I wake in the morning my skin is so hydrated and feels so smooth to the touch. I plan to have this is my arsenal of beauty products full time!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: It keeps the moisture in and my face feels soft and plumped in the morning. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sweets3

customer_reviews.title: A must try.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different products & I love this one. I use it at nighttime & it's very light. In the morning my skin is so soft & it doesn't feel greasy or sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Villafane

customer_reviews.title: Love this Sleeping Mask!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I apply it about 3 times a week and each time it leaves my skin noticeably brighter and softer! This is a must have in anyone's skin care routine! This product also feels like I’m “treating” myself and my skin since the smell and the texture is so lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Erika O.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS SO MUCH YOU DONT EVEN KNOW
customer_reviews.text: IT SMELLS AMAZING IT'S MOISTURIZING ITS SO GOOD AND ABSORBS EASILY NOT GREASY TACKY FEELING SO COOL TO THE SKIN, I LOVE IT SO MUCH AND WILL FOREVER BE MY FAV MASK!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging and stuff. I don’t like the smell that much but otherwise it’s work well and make my skin fell plumped in the morning and very moisterizing so definitely loving this product
customer_reviews.author: Katy D

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not for mature skin
customer_reviews.text: I'm 42, so my skin needs deep moisturizing at night. Unfortunately, this product doesn't do much for me. I've tried a lot of different creams and always keep my skin well hydrated with moisturizers and night creams. Using this at night instead of my night cream, leaves my skin dry in the morning (not as dry as using nothing at all, but not as good as a cream). I do find the scent pleasant, and it feels nice going on.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this but I quickly came to realize it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this but I quickly came to realize it was breaking me out, even when I used it sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same product you buy in stores. I don’t know if this a knock off of it. The texture is different and If you compare this to the real one there are slight small differences on the product labeling.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love the texture and feeling of it on my skin. However, I hate the film it leaves on in the morning and the fact it isn't cruelty free.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Did my waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is no better than something at the dollar store! The directions tell you to “breath in the wonderful scent of the product” 2 times and the scent is soapy smelling! Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Like a drink for your face.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff! It’s like giving your skin a drink of water. I use it almost every night, and if I want to look extra “fresh” I use it as a 15 min mask before applying makeup. It’s a life saver for after flights, and actually next time I fly I’ll probably wear it on the plane. Will definitely be purchasing it again. Oh, and this product is about $12 more expensive at Sephora 😏
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Leonard

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this product and that is why I purchased the full size. I moisture surge by Clinique. This product costs less but is a bit stickier than the clinique, so I use this exclusively at night.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Seems very moisturizing and doesn't smell bad. I use it before I go to sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems very moisturizing and doesn't smell bad. I use it before I go to sleep and I wake up with a softer face. When I wash my face in the morning it does feel a little slimmey to wash off.
customer_reviews.author: Sealed With a Kiss J.

customer_reviews.title: Feels Great on the Skin
customer_reviews.text: This reminds me of the Neutrogena Hydroboost Gel , only that you get wayyyy more product with this one as opposed to the Neutrogena. Great for oily skin, lightweight, not sticky or greasy, melts into the skin and leaves my skin looking plump and rejuvenated
customer_reviews.author: Kaila Powell

customer_reviews.title: This is very light and not creamy. I would ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very light and not creamy. I would suggest this for people who have oily skin as its not thick or creamy.
customer_reviews.author: bernadette

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good product and does what it says
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product and does what it says. I use this overnight as my last step after my at home peels or if my skin feels tight and I wake up with soft skin. It hasn’t caused any breakouts on my oily acne prone skin. It’s nice, but I do think I can find an even better overnight mask.
customer_reviews.author: lena

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love a decent korean product this one takes the cake. But i rather buy it in sephora since shipping fee is pretty exp.
customer_reviews.author: chris roxas

customer_reviews.title: Caused some breakouts
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited for this night mask but after a few days I started breaking out pretty bad so I had to return this. No issues with return or refund, great texture and smell but just didn't go with my skin type
customer_reviews.author: Shot Caller, Top Baller!

customer_reviews.title: I won't live without this....
customer_reviews.text: My Korean friend brought this to me as a gift and I have been addicted ever since!!! Your skin is dewy and looks healthy and not greasy. Being in menopause when you're changing this is a phenomenal product that makes your make up glide on and not seep into fine wrinkles! Great product and awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It is a fair product
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen any magic result yet. But it has nice smell and is very mild on face/eyes. And the texture is jelly watery, like it. Don't expect if you have uneven skin tone and hope to get it better overnight. It only help moisturizing my face.
customer_reviews.author: aliengirl

customer_reviews.title: Very watery, not moisturing at all
customer_reviews.text: Not moisturizing at all... Overall very watery consistency. Did nothing of the benefits outlined for the product. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: shweta

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin, love it
customer_reviews.text: Hydrate your skin. Been using it for years. Good. You can also add essential oil in it. Works great. I have dry skin. So I love this
customer_reviews.author: chrisa

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: My face feels great the next morning! I've discovered Korean skincare and I'm African-American!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gives you soft and radiant skin!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a present for my mom (which I still use here and there) and it is absolutely amazing if you have dehydrated skin! I used to put it on more often during the winter months in the evening, and when I woke up in the morning to wash it off, my face was plump and glowed! My mom loved it too. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Smells so good
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Smells so good, feels so good. Don’t expect to get any big improvements in your skin, Just enjoy it on a night you want to pamper yourself with a epsom salt bath and a good book.
customer_reviews.author: alena summ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! It works
customer_reviews.text: Was trying out some Korean products and of all the tons of things i purchase this has by far been the most hydrating. I'm African so take it from me when i say i've been battling with dry skin especially during winter. I used this at night and wake up with a fresh face. you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: miss sly

customer_reviews.title: I still wake up feeling like my skin is parched in the mornings
customer_reviews.text: This product was only okay to me. I'm using Veltin on my skin right now, which has similar effects of drying to Accutane. I wanted something very hydrating overnight, and this wasn't it. I still wake up feeling like my skin is parched in the mornings, no matter how much I layer this on top of my Cerave PM Lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Serra Abak

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would've bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask! Idk what some of the other reviewers are talking about, but this mask is the genuine article. No skin sensitivity whatsoever (and I have very sensitive skin.) Will purchase a million times over!
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: My skin looks great the day after using this
customer_reviews.text: My skin looks great the day after using this. Be sure to clean your pores in the morning since it will cause breakouts if you let it stay in.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does nothing more than water does for appearance of skin. Would not re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Ima Reader

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail!!!
customer_reviews.text: My holy grail!!! I have really dry skin and this is the only moisturizer that kept my skin hydrated without being oily. Love it! This is my second purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a nice product with a good price. It has a great feel on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Barrows

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit Merch. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT LANIEGE WATER MASK like at Sephora. Counterfeit merch. Do not buy. My face so immediately itchy and irritated. After looking at packaging closet I threw away and got the real deal at Sephora. No issues at all with real cream.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Completely dried out my skin and made it very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I understand how but this project makes my skin drier than before use. I would guess not made for normal/sensitive skill.
customer_reviews.author: MCS

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty good overnight mask, good price. My skin type is dry, I need to use mask to keep balancing. For this mask, all I need is to apply it on my face and then go to sleep. One little thing that I love about is it came with a little spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laneige products are really good and the price is very reasonable as well
customer_reviews.text: Laneige products are really good and the price is very reasonable as well. This water sleeping mask is really easy to use for every day mask keeping your skin soft, smooth and hydrated. I'm glad Amazon carries this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lilylove75

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have never had zits in my entire life (i have super dry skin) and this made my whole forehead break out. Didn’t hydrate my skin at all. Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Maia Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Use this three times a week over a moisturizer. Especially good after using bha. Sensitive, combo, dehydrated skin. Does not break me out
customer_reviews.author: Maglio

customer_reviews.title: Water Mask Improves Complexion!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses Laneige water mask to improve her complexion. She no longer has acne, and her scars have faded. She looks beautiful, and her skin is glowing. Try this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jean M. Gallant

customer_reviews.title: Averagely Okay
customer_reviews.text: This product is quite scented, I don’t like perfume in my face products. I wish these products would come in a pump dispenser, the jar can get messy. I think this is just average as a moisturizing sleep mask, it dries down fast though which is good. People with oily skin might like this more, I need something a little more moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Nice hydration
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. It is very hard to please me, but I am ordering this product for the second time. I feel the difference in the morning when I use this mask. And the price is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Solo

customer_reviews.title: Best Sleeping Mask to add moisture to your skin
customer_reviews.text: This helped me a lot during the winter time where my skin was extremely dry. I use this as the last step of skin care routine. When I woke up in the morning, my skin felt so soft and not dry anymore. It will be my staple for dry winter time.
customer_reviews.author: PO

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice sleeping mask but the whole concept of sleeping with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sleeping mask but the whole concept of sleeping with something applied thickly on the face is not something I'm used to. I will use it up but will not repurchase. If you like sleeping masks with a slight flowery scent, you will like this product.
customer_reviews.author: SassyBanjo

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: You need this. Bought this for my travels this past summer and it was a game changer. Used it on the plane ride and whenever my face needed an extra boost of hydration. It's not that sticky. Give it some time to dry down before sleeping
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Pampers & hydrates even really dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Great moisturizer. Readily absorbed & long lasting. Clean pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY J ELLINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Not good but not great
customer_reviews.text: This product is just okay, but not worth getting. It feels ok at first but after applying it, it's sticky. I'd rather just put on a good moisturizer. Get Laneige's lip mask instead!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Lightly scented with a nice light yet hydrating formula. Does tend to leave a little sticky residue however
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy applying this. It’s light and not at all greasy. I can even wear it under my make up which I would normally not do. It had a subtle but enjoyable scent.
customer_reviews.author: bbg

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Not heavy, feels nice. Have noticed that my skin seems smoother
customer_reviews.author: Kbecker

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I've lusted after this a while and I finally nabbed it when it dropped in price. It came packaged up nicely, and when I opened it I was pleased that the scent isn't too strong. The pack is like a gel, and a little goes a long way. I really like it, the morning after my face feels plumper and smoother. The moisturizing effect in this is perfect for my combination skin, it doesn't make my oily parts oily at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: This goes on like nothing, and does a great job at moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This goes on like nothing, and does a great job at moisturizing. In addition, I feel like my skin has cleared up a lot more since I started using it, which is really really really nice.
customer_reviews.author: zhelobanana

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: When I finish this I’m buy another, this is incredible. Loves this so much and the texture to is idk it’s unique to other produces I’ve used. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julissa

customer_reviews.title: Super moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: My face feels super moisturized. I love the smell to. I will definitely get this again
customer_reviews.author: Sara zollinger

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I like my skin in the morning after I use it. It feels fresh, elastic, hydrated and rested. Definitely buying this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Olesya

product_meta.title: [Laneige] 2015 Renewal - Water Sleeping Mask
feature_bullets: Overnight skin care for hydrated and bright skin. for all skin types.
